surface_layer.definition: An improved or more efficient process of injecting particles, such as electrons, into a system.

deep_layer.mechanism: Radially polarized beams create stronger accelerating fields, resulting in a more efficient particle injection process.

examples: Using a tailored laser pulse to enhance electron injection into a plasma wakefield.
